name: Accounting
details: Key skills that hiring managers want financial analysts to learn from their accounting courses are an understanding of debits and credits

name: Financial Statements
details: When it comes to financial statements, there are many important things analysts need to understand. The most important concepts to get from finance classes are how to construct an income statement

name: Math
details: It’s critical for financial analysts to have a solid understanding of financial math, and in particular, know how to calculate present value

name: Excel
details: Excel is the number one tool for every finance professional. It’s critical to know how to use all the various formulas, functions

name: Financial Analysis
details: This is the “core” of a financial analyst’s job description. Classes on financial analysis will teach you how to calculate metrics like margins, growth rates, P/E ratio

name: Financial Statements
details: When it comes to financial statements, there are many important things analysts need to understand. The most important concepts to get from finance classes are how to construct an income statement
